name: Kisses & Caffeine (Box of 12
description:
If you are what you eat, and you’re such a smart cookie, it stands to reason these treats were made for you! Made with all-natural ingredients and carefully crafted recipes, these nine yummy cookies hit the sweet spot between delicious decadence and thoughtfully calibrated performance food. Bite into caffeinated Awaken Baked and vitality-boosting Chocolate Chip Nookie.


6 Awaken Baked, 6 Chocolate Chip Nookies

name: Perfect Workout (Box of 9)
description:
If you are what you eat, and you’re such a smart cookie, it stands to reason these treats were made for you! Made with all-natural ingredients and carefully crafted recipes, these nine yummy cookies hit the sweet spot between delicious decadence and thoughtfully calibrated performance food. Bite into caffeinated Awaken Baked, peanut butter and protein-packed Tough Cookie, and vegan sweet potato Great Full. 


3 Awaken Baked, 3 Tough Cookies, 3 Great Full

name: Healthy Living Pack (Box of 12)
description:
6 Snap Back (Ginger Detox Cookie)

6 Great Full (Sweet Potato Wellness Cookie)

name: 12 Assorted Cookies
description: Try all The Cookie Department's fantastic cookies to bring full functionality to all aspects of your day! This mixed box contains at least two of each of our cookies!

name: Awaken Baked (Box of 12)
description:
Awaken Baked
Fully Functional Caffeinated Espresso Cookie

The Cookie Department's project to perfect the naturally caffeinated espresso cookie, code-named "AWAKEN BAKED," was declassified in September.

Our dedicated staff worked 24/7 to measure, mix, bake off, taste and test countless batches in a quest for the perfect quotient of ORGANIC COFFEE, CHOCOLATE CHIPS and SEA SALT.

Their breakthrough came in the early morning hours of August 4th when the team discovered the perfect chill/buzz ratio, long considered the holy grail of naturally caffeinated baked products.

Box of 12

name: Chocolate Chip Nookie (Box of 12)
description:
Chocolate Chip Nookie
Fully Functional Vitality Cookie

The Chocolate Chip Nookie was the Cookie Department's second cookie, and is one of our favorites. Based on the Cookie Department's cutting edge research into the Peruvian Root MACA, which is believed to increase vitality in both men and women, the Chocolate Chip Nookie is also just about the best Chocolate Chip cookie you've ever tasted.

Box of 12 Cookies

name: Great Full (Box of 12)
description:
Great Full
Fully Functional Vegan Sweet Potato Wellness Cookie

Want to be great? Try our vegan sweet potato, cranberry and oatmeal cookie. Sweet potatoes are high in antioxidants while oatmeal satisfies and cranberries are just yummy! Rich in molasses and vanilla flavors, this cookie tastes just like a holiday. Give thanks for the Great Full cookie!

Box of 12 Cookies

name: Tough Cookie (Box of 12)
description:
Tough Cookie
Fully Functional Peanut Butter Protein Cookie

The Tough Cookie is designed to amplify the natural protein filled powers of peanut butter with an additional 10g of protein. We designed it to be the ideal post-workout treat, but it is equally well suited to a day of cubicle lockdown, when a little extra strength is an absolute necessity.

Box of 12 Cookies

name: Snap Back (Box of 12)
description:
Snap Back
Fully Functional Ginger Detox Cookie

Ever had one of those nights that turns tomorrow into one of those days? Yeah, us too. That's why we worked with natural detoxifiers like cayenne pepper, black strap molasses and ginger to create the come back king of a ginger snap: the Snap Back cookie. Cheers to you tonight and Snap Back tomorrow!

Box of 12 Cookies
